/* WtsMnhoMap.SelectWtsMnhoList 상수맨홀 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.MAN_STD = #MAN_STD#
A.SOM_CDE = #SOM_CDE#
A.MHS_CDE = #MHS_CDE#
A.ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.IST_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.IST_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS IST_YMD , A.MAN_STD /*규격*/ , A.SOM_CDE /*맨홀종류*/ , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250012' AND DTL_CD = A.SOM_CDE ) AS SOM_NAM , A.MHS_CDE /*맨홀형태*/ , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250049' AND DTL_CD = A.MHS_CDE ) AS MHS_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.MAN_STD = #MAN_STD#
A.SOM_CDE = #SOM_CDE#
A.MHS_CDE = #MHS_CDE#
A.ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* WtsMnhoMap.SelectWtsMnhoDtl 상수맨홀 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , a.IST_YMD , A.MAN_STD /*규격*/ , A.SOM_CDE /*맨홀종류*/ , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250012' AND DTL_CD = A.SOM_CDE ) AS SOM_NAM , A.MHS_CDE /*맨홀형태*/ , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250012' AND DTL_CD = A.MHS_CDE ) AS MHS_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM , A.ANG_DIR FROM INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , MAN_STD , SOM_CDE , MHS_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #MAN_STD# , #SOM_CDE# , #MHS_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )

/* 상수맨홀 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , MAN_STD = #MAN_STD# , SOM_CDE = #SOM_CDE# , MHS_CDE = #MHS_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , MAN_STD = #MAN_STD# , SOM_CDE = #SOM_CDE# , MHS_CDE = #MHS_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , MAN_STD , SOM_CDE , MHS_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #MAN_STD# , #SOM_CDE# , #MHS_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )
/* 상수맨홀 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
